boardgame.name: Catan telepesei junior
Catan: Junior
boardgame.description: Explore the seas! Catan: Junior introduces a modified playing style of the classic Settlers of Catan, giving players as young as five a perfect introduction to the Catan series of games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Catan: Junior takes place on a ring of islands where 2 to 4 players build hideouts and encounter the mysterious Spooky Island, where the Ghost Captain lives. Each island generates a specific resource: wood, goats, molasses or swords, and players can acquire gold. Each player starts with two pirate hideouts on different islands, and they can use the resources they acquire to build ships, hideouts or get help from Coco the Parrot. By building ships, they can expand their network; the more hideouts they build, the more resources they may receive. Just watch out for the dreaded Ghost Captain!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Be the first player to control seven pirate hideouts, and you win!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;What sets this apart from the previous Die Siedler von Catan: Junior from 2007:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; This game is playable with two as it comes with a two-player map._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The three- and four-player map is larger and is more symmetrical, so that two of the colors don't operate at a disadvantage._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The map now shows die faces rather than numbers for resource production._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Many of the event cards have been removed to make the game simpler._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; There are no cards in the game only tiles for more durability._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; There are no longer harbors in the game. In the original game you had to set up the board with random secret harbor tiles that allow for better trades with the bank. Now the trading to the bank is simpler and can be done from the beginning and doesn't require people to build to the harbors._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The resources are different._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; There is a race for the Coco the Parrot tiles (rather than 'CoCo Helps' cards) and those that have the most get to put an extra piece on the board (one step closer to winning), tied players take their piece off the island and leave it vacated._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The market is now a part of the board, and can be traded into only once on your turn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; By default, Trading with other players is excluded and only part of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;advanced game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. In Die Siedler von Catan: Junior trading with other players could be excluded to simplify the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As in Die Siedler von Catan: Junior you can't chain ships; you must build a pirate lair before continuing on._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Description: Catan Junior Used/Complete Shipping Weight: 3 lbs Orders are usually shipped within one business day of receiving payment. You can calculate the shipping cost at usps.com / ups.com by choosing 60134 as the sending zip code and adding the weights of all games purchased together (yes, we do combine items for shipping so take a look at our other games as the cost of shipping that second or third game is small compared to the first one) and adding 1 pound for packaging materials. I will ship via whatever method you prefer. International buyers please note... shipping overseas is EXPENSIVE. For that first game (unless it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s tiny) it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be no less than $30... additional games don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t add much to that, but shipping just one game is costly. Please be aware of that before placing an order.
